5842.name: {yA Deserted Store{x
description: In this enclosure their rests many broken bottles, broken crates
lie in a corner, and spilled, but spoiled goods litter the floor.  The
store has a musty smell, from the looks of it, it has most likely been
abandoned since the outlaws came.  Light pierces through the windows
and lights up the room shadowy, letting in only rays, blocks of light.

5738.name: Door to the Outside
description: You stand at the door leading to the east tower.  There is a stair case
leading up to the hallway or the door to the south going out.  The door to
the south makes a whistling noise, has the harsh winds of the desert whip
past the door.

5895.name: {*[{7H{&essel {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8The lighting is dim here, many shadows cast all about.  Some pubs
and shops line the street, shedding light upon it through their
windows.  Hurriedly, people walk along it, weary of the outlaws of
this area.  Clanks and unidentifiable sounds emanate from the airship
facility, looming north of you over the roofs of buildings.  Off to
the east lies a revered academy, a haze of smoke flowing past it.  {x

5753.name: Outside Cell 5
description: You stand in the dungeons of Figaro Castle.
Cell 5 is to the north.

5815.name: {*[{7T{&agan {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WThe street is difficult to walk on, the light being the only savor
from falling over a loose cobblestone or being robbed blind buy a
local professional.  To the south, a almost visible stench emanates
from a shop labeled "{gJu{cav{gier's {yAnimal {rSticks{W".  Slightly further east,
are the wrought gates of the city.  In a western direction loud music
can be heard coming from a local night club.  {x

5829.name: {rGel{ydas{rh's {yJo{ri{ynt{x
description: {WHaze fills the room and billows out openings to the outside.  All
around there lye half hidden bongs.  Stems of some sort litter the
carpet along with ash stains.  There are couches lining the walls and
a man behind a counter in a corner.  Geldash is known in this part of
town for high quality bud, and judging by the decor, no one would
doubt it.
{x

5807.name: {*[{7H{&essel {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {DThe lighting is dim here, many shadows cast all about.  Some pubs
and shops line the street, shedding light upon it through their
windows.  Hurriedly, people walk along it, wary of the outlaws of this
area.  Clanks and unidentifiable sounds emanate from the airship
facility, one of it's entrances lieing directly to the northern end of
the street.  {x

5906.name: {*[{7M{&iner {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WEver present are the shadows that are cast all about, as the
lighting continues to be weak.  To the north, a small patch of {Ggrass
{Wcan be seen.  Odd..  {GGrass {Wthis far from the {#Sun{W.  It makes one wonder
about the true nature of this city.  The road continues to the north
and the south.  {x

5817.name: {WThe {8Night {WClub {W"{YB{rad{Ya {rB{Yin{rg{x"
description: {CMa{ck{Cou {8powered lights {Yflash {8around, see{bm{8ingly m{ba{8k{bi{8ng t{bh{8e clu{bb {8a{b{8live{b.
{8 A ba{brt{8en{bd{8er {bs{8tands {bbe{8hin{bd {8the b{ba{8r,servi{bi{8ng d{r{8inks t{bo {8pa{btr{8ons as h{be
{8wat{bc{8hes {bt{8he dancefl{bo{8or long{bin{8gly.  {bT{8he dan{bc{8eflo{bo{8or is lit{bt{8ered w{bi{8th
many peopl{be {8dan{bc{8ing and ha{bv{8ing an a{bl{8l out go{bo{8d time{b.  {8The wall{bs {8are
pa{bint{8ed abs{bt{8ractl{by{8, cre{ba{8ting {ba{8 new a{bg{8e air to {bt{8h{e{8 whole r{bo{8oom.  {x

5993.name: {*[{7A{&lexandria {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WA bustling street at this point, it is almost shoulder to shoulder.
People are running about like mad.  A bright {Ggreen {Wglow can be seen
from the northeast which is where airships come in.  {XD{WE{XA{WD{XW{WI{XL{WL{XO{WW {XS{WQ{XU{WA{XR{WE
is to the east and there is a vacant lot to the north.  Those seem to
be in abundance here.  {x

5748.name: Outside Cell 3
description: You stand in the dungeons of Figaro Castle.
Cell 3 is to the north.

5790.name: {xThe {CMa{ck{Cou {xPawn Shop
description: {DBehind the counter stands a tall elven man and many objects of all
sorts and types.  There are trinkets, weapons, potions, scrolls,
anything and everything that one could find is here.  Most of his
wares are in very well piled stacks, or piles.  Sturdy rod-iron gates
ward and protect the wares from thievery.
{x

5828.name: {8D{Wans {8D{Wevious {8D{Wisguises{x
description: {8Various costumes are displayed here, some strewn across the ground,
others resting on the walls.  A counter in the back holds costumes..
Or..  Disguises of a higher caliber.  Behind it stands a man,
obviously dawning a fake mustache of his creation.  There are minor
disguise kits, to fake a scar or such, and full on masks to hide could
hide your identity...  Should you wish to conceal it...  Quite well.  {x

5756.name: Cell 5
description: A room with no air, no light no sanity. A small bed hangs on the
wall to the west. A small sink and toilet sits in here too. You
are dead. You don't deserve to live anymore.

5793.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry {&C{*oal {&M{*ine{x
description: {*Two rails run into darkness, the only light comes from Makou Gas Lanterns
hanging from the sides of the wall.  The walls, ceiling, and floor are
black, made from coal.  The walls seem to breath in and out....  The shaft
ends, and only a black wall stands here.{x

5893.name: {*[{7T{&agan {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WThis street is horribly paved but well lighted.  The smell of
liquor is strong, wafting from a church westward.  Easternly you can
see many shops, and hear loud music emanating from the club {YB{rad{Ya {rB{Yin{rg{W.
Various people walk past, some more suspicious characters attempting
to "accidentaly" bump into you.  Another smell conflicts with the
alcohol, the smell of decay, coming from a shop further along
eastward.  {x

5794.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry {&C{*oal {&M{*ine{x
description: {*Two rails run into darkness, the only light comes from Makou Gas Lanterns
hanging from the sides of the wall.  The walls, ceiling, and floor are
black, made from coal.  The walls seem to breath in and out....  The shaft
ends, and only a black wall stands here.{x

5985.name: {G>{g> {GM{gakou{c-{CZ{cero {MT{munnel {g<{G<{x
description: A massive tunnel runs away from Makou City to the south, north out
the northern face of the volcano.  The tunnel itself is large enough
for two large airships to pass side by side with enough clearance, and
for even walking traffic to creep along the sides.  Large gas lanterns
hang on either side of the tunnel walls.  Above massive pipes run out
of the ceilings, smaller ones connecting off running to the lanterns.
Steam and other gases hiss from the pipes of Makou Zero above.

5722.name: In the Hallway
description: This is the back hallway, you walk up a pair of stairs that leads to the
main tower.  You see a few paintings, and a pot in the corner.  To the
northeast you see a door, with stairs behind it.

5721.name: Infront of the East Door
description: You stand infront of the eastern door.  To the east is the Northern part
of the mainhall.  To the north is the door, leading into the back hallway.

5834.name: {8The Strip Club "{RSed{ruct{Rress {rHa{Rv{ren{8"{x
description: Considered the {Cje{cwe{Cl{x of the City by many residing {8O{Wu{8t{Wl{8a{Ww{8's{x the
{RSed{ruct{Rress {rHa{Rv{ren {x is one of the few good strip clubs in the realms.
All around lay leather couches, there is a bar in one corner, and all
around there are rased platforms with poles in the center.  Beautiful
women of many races dance {RSed{ructi{Rvely{x on platforms, while others work
the floor.  There are many people throughout the room, Outlaws getting
lapdances or local drunks catching up on empty shotglasses with
eachother.
A picture hangs here, honoring a particularily beautiful woman that used to work here, but now uses her immense skills of {RSed{ructi{Ron {xto ensnare her enemys.{x

5914.name: {*[{7P{&ick {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WFights in the streets, broken bottles laying about, unconscious
people strewn everywhere.  The road, and fights, continue both north
and south.  {x

5921.name: {3Makou Tunnel
description: {3This is a tunnel that leads to Makou City.  The entire tunnel is
through solid rock.  It would appear that someone took a giant metal
tool and carved out the way.  A small patch of {Gg{grass {3 grows on the
wall here, no larger than a dagger.  It comes out of solid rock.  The
tunnel continues to the north, and the south leads onto an open
street.  {x

5892.name: {*[{7H{&essel {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8The lighting is dim here, many shadows cast all about.  But from
what can be seen, not as many stores line this street as others.
People walk along it hurriedly, some suspiciously through the shadows.
Further along, one shop can be seen, large cuts of meat hung crudely
in front, visible from even this distant.  Sounds echo from the
looming airship facility, noticeable over the roofs of the northern
buildings.  {x

5745.name: Dungeon of Figaro Castle
description: You here the moans and groans of prisoners in here.  To either side of
you, a danke hallway leaders pass several iron bared doors.  A guard stands
here, asking what business you have to be in this dungeon.

5982.name: {y[{Y[ {&T{*he {GM{gakou{7-{RT{rorregiano {GR{goad {Y]{y]{x
description: A cobble stone road connects from the bridge to the south, leading
away from the mountains northwards into the Istar Flatlands, better
known as the Torregiano Plains.  Around the road the grassy fields
open up, revealing the city of Torregiano to the northeast.  Its
massive super structures clearly visable from this distance.
Southwards the stone bridge leads across a shallow canyon and river,
leading into the side of a volcano.  Northwards the road connects into
the major road between Torregiano, Vector and the Elven Valley.

5723.name: Middle Of the Hallway
description: A gust of wind blows through the doorway.  You see bright light coming
down from above the stairs.  To the east and west is a door, and up is the
tower.

5700.name: {&<{*< {CI{cntersection of {7C{&oal {cand {7H{&essel {*>{&>{x
description: {8Many shops and pubs are in all directions, various people,
merchants, even outlaws travel the streets, entering shops or talking
with others they meet along the way.  Off to the far north can be seen
the reactor and airship facility.  Not so far off to the south stands
the statue at Outlaw Square, the center of town.  {x

5824.name: {YT{ya{rg{yu{Yl{y'{Ys {yTa{rc{yos{x
description: {yThe room smells intoxicatingly of chili sauce and beef.  Tagul
stands in back, apprehensively awaiting your order.  The room is
painted in a tacky manner, trying to show a desert scene.
Uncomfortable seats and a tacky sombrero await patrons at their
tables, along with half clean dishes, and some of Tagul's high quality
cooking.  {x

5749.name: Cell 3
description: A room with no air, no light no sanity. A small bed hangs on the
wall to the west. A small sink and toilet sits in here too. You
are dead. You don't deserve to live anymore.

5874.name: {W<{D<{CI{cntersection of{XA{Wlexandria {cand {XI{Wves{D>{W>
description: {WThis is the intersection of {XA{Wlexandria {Wand {XI{Wves.  There is nothing
of very much usefulness here, except for people making their way
through the city.  That is not a suprise though.  There is some {Ggrass
{Won {XI{Wves though, and that does seem a bit odd.  It is to the north.  {x

5740.name: By The East Tower
description: You stand infront of the eastern tower, The King's Tower.  A pair of
heavly bolted doors stands before you, not letting killers in.

5979.name: {G>{g> {GM{gakou{c-{CZ{cero {MT{munnel {g<{G<{x
description: {x
{CP {R|| {GM{x    The massive tunnel carved from the insides of this dead
{cO {R|| {gA{x  volcano shine black in the light of the Makou Lanterns
{cR {R|| {gK{x  hanging from the walls.  The passage is big enough for two
{cT {R|| {gO{x  large airships to pass by each other safely.  In this
{R|| {gU{x  particular section the tunnel widens, allowing for a cross
{R||{x    road between the vertical shaft of the volcano core above.
{R\\{R||//{x  Below is the Airship Facility known as Port Makou.  To the
{R \\//{x   north is the outside tunnel end, to the south, Makou City.

5891.name: {*[{7C{&oal {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Just north lies the northern gate of the city, southwards lies the
rest of the town.  Few people travel this street, although some can be
seen in the distance to the south.  The whole street is errily quiet,
with no shops in direct vicinity.  {x

5843.name: {8B{Wl{8a{Wc{8k{Wj{8a{Wc{8k{W'{8s {yBar{x
description: Local outlaws hang out here at the infamous bar of Blackjack,
retired outlaw.  Known for its spectacular bar fights and notoriety
for harboring outlaws and fugtitives.  On the wall there are many
wanted posters, most pictures on them matchable to people throughout
the bar.

5918.name: {*[{7A{&xe {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThe light is still poor here, and it should be better, but for lack
of repair crews, that is why it is the way it is.  It sounds like a
bar room brawl is up north, but the south doesn't really look much
safer than north sounds.  {x

5791.name: {WThe Bank "{YFe{yll{Ys {yW{Yar{ygo{W"{x
description: {RBlood {Wstains all the walls, and iron bars lie on the ground bent
and wrenched apart.  All that remains of the bank is a few silver
coins, and the corpse of the gnomish banker, rotting slowly in the
back corner.  The room smells horribly, and judging by the state of
the banker, there will be no transactions done today.  {x

5726.name: Ontop Of The Tower
description: You stand on top of the tallest tower in the castle. The whole castle and
the Sand of Sorrow stretch before you. To the northeast you see a great
port city, and the rough waters of the Sea of Swords. As you stare into
the black clouds of the sea you think you see a purple strip, almost like
a magical rift.

5746.name: Outside Cell 1
description: You stand in the dungeons of Figaro Castle.
Cell 1 is to the north.

5910.name: {*[{7M{&akou {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WCommotion can be heard from the east, and the crowds are thinning
out at this end of {XM{Wakou.  Sounds from the airship facility echo all
through the streets and no one seems to pay it any attention.  They
just hurry on their way, to get to where they're going.  The road is
practically empty to the west.  {x

5805.name: {*[{7H{&essel {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8The lighting is dim here, many shadows cast all about.  Some pubs
and shops line the street, shedding light upon it through their
windows.  Hurriedly, people walk along it, weary of the outlaws of
this area.  Clanks and unidentifiable sounds emanate from the airship
facility, looming north of you over the roofs of buildings.  To the
north lies a shop with many masks shown in the window, and to the
south a local bar.  {x

5844.name: {RB{8ack{RS{8tab's {CP{8ub{x
description: This pub was created by BackStab himself, when he opened his dagger
store across the street.  Every week, he has exotic drink imported to
the pub by contacts he met while out and about in the world.  Everyone
he's hired here have been people he's met in some way somewhere else.
And while most bars disuade their customers from starting bar fights,
BackStab almost encourages it.  Of course, the healing magics used here
are second to (almost) none.

5735.name: Ontop of the West Tower
description: This is the top of the tower.  The view here of the desert is great.
Yellow sand totally surrounds the castle, and in the far distance other
colors can be seen.  To the south, the blue of the Sea Of Diamonds can just
be seen, as a sliver, almost looking like the horizon.  To the north, you
can see the green of the forests, and in the far far distance, 4 towers.  To
the east the Sea Of Swords flows, which disappears into the horizon.  To the
west, the brown and white mountains of the elemental canyon.

5782.name: {*[{7T{&agan {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WLighted rather well compared to many other streets of the area, it
is not difficult to notice the quality of the road is lacking to that
of the lighting quality.  Stepping along it proves quite a task, with
many loose cobblestones along the way.  On the south end of the street
lies the {yTavern of the {rSlain {yBoar{W, another of the many bars in the
area.  {x

5754.name: Outside Cell 6
description: You stand in the dungeons of Figaro Castle.
Cell 6 is to the north.

5916.name: {*[{7N{&orth {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WThere is more light here for some off reason that boggles the mind.
What that reason is though, it is unknown.  That has not stopped any
of the action though, the fighting still take place right in plain
view, and no one does anything to stop it from happening.  East and
west are the only places to go, since there are no shops here.  {x

5702.name: Path Going To The Cliff
description: Here the path gets narror to the south. A sheer cliff goes almost
to a vertical drop.

5734.name: Queen's Sleeping Chambers
description: This room is fit for a queen.  A large feather bed sits to one corner,
filled with pillows and blankets.  Over the fireplace diffrent jewler sits,
diamonds and gems.  The floor is covered in that same blue and red carpet
that is in the hallway.  Vanity tables sit in a corner, filled with diffrent
creams and jels.  A large iron door is to one side, leading to the top of
the tower.

5762.name: Ladder at 150ft
description: You now cannot see either up or down from this point.  The only think
that lets you know your alive is the cold steal of the lader, and the
dropplet of water that passes by you.

5885.name: Row Houses
description: 5 Houses

5759.name: Engine Room
description: The room is very loud, the sound of machinery cranks in your ears, almost
too much to listen to.  Pipes and gears turn and make sounds all around
here.  To the north, a large iron switch stands in the wall, a man guards
it, waiting for the command to pull it.  A large iron door leads to the
west, on the door all you see is a symbol, which looks like 4 bars.

5707.name: {*[{7W{&est {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WW{Dest {WA{Dvenue {Win all it's glory, for what it's worth.  This street
here has empty lots up for sale.  Shops, or houses, or any other type
of building can be put here.  {x

5875.name: {W<{D<{CI{cntersection of {XA{Wlexandria {cand {XE{Wast{x{D>{W>
description: {WIt would appear that this city has nothing but shops, and vacant
lots.  People hurry from where they are coming to where they are
going, If the lot is not vacant, there is construction of some kind,
and the people pay no mind to it.  {x

5919.name: {*[{7A{&xe {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThis road was named well, for in the lantern posts, there are marks
that appear to have been made from an axe.  Some notches are stained
with {Rb{rlood {W but any other hint of foul play is not present.  What
would one expect though, for evidence to lay out in the open?  That
would make sense.  Loud sounds of fighting are to the north, and to
the south are more shadows, and more roads.  {x

5795.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry {&C{*oal {&M{*ine{x
description: {*Two rails run into darkness, the only light comes from Makou Gas Lanterns
hanging from the sides of the wall.  The walls, ceiling, and floor are
black, made from coal.  The walls seem to breath in and out....  The shaft
ends, and only a black wall stands here.{x

5778.name: {Y@{*]-[{CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {RTunnel{*]-[{Y@{x
description: A light shines in from the north.  Sounds of life echo against the cold
rock walls.  The tunnel goes either direction..  North or South.

5831.name: {RB{8ack{RS{8tab's {RD{8aggers{x
description: This shop is dark, nearly to the point where the average customer
would need a lantern.  The low light, though, reveals of the shop's
wares what brighter light would not.  Some of the daggers that line
the back wall glow with an inner power.  While the other more accessible
daggers, do not display such magic, they are, none the less, of good
quality.

5884.name: {W<{D<{CI{cntersection of {WM{Dakou {cand {WI{Dves {D>{W>
description: {WThere is nothing special about this intersection, except maybe that
there are no empty lots.  People are still hurrying about as if they
need to get things done now.  It could be that, or just the threat of
what lurks in the shadows.  {x {WThere appears to be some {Ggrass {Wto the
south on {XI{Wves.  {x

5820.name: {YGi{ygg{rra{ybb{Yle's {rTa{yt{roo {8Parlor{x
description: {8Along the walls show many various designs, insignias, pictures, and
the occasional spurt of blood.  A Chair rests in the middle of the
room, stress marks on the arm rests where fists have no doubt
clenched.  A unkept drow stands next to it, cleaning a needle
half-assedly, grinning widely.  {x

5784.name: {*[{7C{&oal {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8North of you towers the makou reactor, and south, {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy{8.  To
the west, a horribly destroyed bank lies.  The whole street glitters
from glass of the destroyed bank.  At this part of the city, nearly
all else can be seen, even the faint lights of the nightclub.  An
empty helm lies on the ground at the gate, missing the guard that once
stood under it.  {x

5798.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry {&C{*oal {&M{*ine{x
description: {*Two rails run into darkness, the only light comes from Makou Gas Lanterns
hanging from the sides of the wall.  The walls, ceiling, and floor are
black, made from coal.  The walls seem to breath in and out....  The shaft
ends, and only a black wall stands here.{x

5888.name: {*[{7M{&iner {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WIt almost looks like this road is an alleyway, complete with
menacing shadows.  Though what the shadows hold in store for the
unwary traveler, imagination is not needed.  {GGrass {Wcan be seen far to
the north, and the road continues to the south as well.  {x

5760.name: Inside The Cave
description: You stand within a large cave.  The rock here has been cut out to form a
small room.  A large ladder goes down through the floor into darkness.  A
torch shines light in this damp place.

5751.name: Cell 1
description: A room with no air, no light no sanity. A small bed hangs on the
wall to the west. A small sink and toilet sits in here too. You
are dead. You don't deserve to live anymore.

5818.name: {WT{wh{We {WCh{wur{Wch {Wo{wf {CEv{Ber{wcla{Bri{Cty{x
description: {WA few makeshift pews are here, more suitable for passing out on
then actually sitting.  Along the walls are lined stcained glass
images of pubs from around the realms.  Empty bottles line the aisle,
marking it clearly.  At the head, an altar stands, paying homage to
whichever god invented Alcohol.  Ramone stands behind it, garbed in a
tattered priestly robed, slurring, but preaching nonetheless of the
liquid of forgiveness.  {x

5772.name: SPLASH!!
description: You fall 100 feet down in raging water out of the dam.  You hit the water
here with a large thud.  You survive.  Above you see a giant dam.  The
raging river calms itself and turns to the west.  You feel safe now...

5878.name: {*[{7E{&ast {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThis is yet another one of the unremarkable roads in this city.
There is a lot that lies to the east, but there is something
different.  It would appear that there is construction on it!  North
and south are the ways to go.  {x

5988.name: {g/{R*{g/ {GM{gakou {CF{cuels {g\{B*{g\{x
description: {WAn open lot connects with {XC{Woal {XS{Wtreet to the west and {XT{Wagan {XS{Wtreet
to the south.  In the middle of this stone lot is a large Makou Fuel
Pump, surrounded by the gas lanterns of the city.  A building to the
west stands overlooking the single pump, and a sign on the large front
window reads "Gruffnarks Croner Grocery".  {x

5764.name: Ladder at 250ft
description: The air is getting thick with the moisture that is collecting on the
walls of this damp shaft.  You feel your arms going numb from climbing, you
fear that you may fall to your death.

5806.name: {*[{7H{&essel {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8The lighting is dim here, many shadows cast all about.  Some pubs
and shops line the street, shedding light upon it through their
windows.  Hurriedly, people walk along it, weary of the outlaws of
this area.  Clanks and unidentifiable sounds emanate from the airship
facility, one of its entrances lieing directly to the northern end of
the street.  {x

5780.name: {*[{7C{&oal {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8This street seems to be of the best quality in the city, though
well worn.  All along can be seen pubs and local shops selling their
wares.  People converse among themselves on the streets, shady figures
relieving them of their loads.  Many shops line this main road,
including an inn and some pubs.  To your west lies a delapidated inn,
and to the east a pool hall.  {x

5804.name: {&<{*< {CC{corner of {7H{&essel {cand {7Y{&uliath {*>{&>{x
description: {8From here the street curves west, turning into Hessel.  To the east
you see a well built, and well standing, building with pillars in
front of it, quite unusual comapred to the other architecture of this
city.  To your north, a familiar scent, along with smoke billows out
of a depleted building, curiously instilling hunger.  Various
drunkards fall about themselves on the street here, the occasional
urchin running by.  Off to the west a inn lies, and many various
shops.  {x

5774.name: {Y@{*]-[{CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {RTunnel Docks{*]-[{Y@{x
description: THUMP.  You boat hits a dock.  You see the river goes into a small lake
here, but you have been stopped at the dock.  You see from the dock a tunnel
goes westwards into nothingness.

5911.name: {XM{Wakou {XS{Wtreet{X
description: {WPoor lighting and deep shadows are some cause for concern here.
Shadows are the best friend of those who would deal trouble to
newcomers and the weak.  People hurry about their business as if
nothing were wrong.  Beggars can be seen here and there.  There is a
{3tunnel {Wto the north, and another to the south.  {XM{Wakou {XS{Wtreet continues
on to the east and west.  {x

5803.name: {*[{7Y{&uliath {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Along this shady cobblestone street line pubs and various shops
trying to pawn their wares.  Few people walk the street, and with
protection.  Shutters lay closed shut and the only light to counteract
the shady atmosphere of the street emanates the various pubs and
shops.  {x

5761.name: Ladder at 50ft
description: As you climb the damn and moldy ladder down, down into the depth of the
earth, water drips down from above, going into the darkness.

5713.name: West Courtyard
description: You stand to the western part of the courtyard.  Here, large stone steps
lead up to a door, which goes into the western half of the castle.  The
courtyard stretches to the far east.

5890.name: {*[{7C{&oal {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Just north lies the northern gate of the city, southwards lies the
rest of the town.  Few people travel this street, although some can be
seen in the distance to the south.  The whole street is errily quiet,
with no shops in direct vicinity.  {x

5727.name: Throne Room Of Figaro Castle
description: You stand in the great throne room of Figaro Castle.  A large rug runs
the length of the room, leading right up to the throne.  The rug is blue,
red and gold, the castle colors.  The walls are covered in flags and
banners.  In each corner a statue of some sort stands.  Above you a large
glass dome, lets sunlight come in.  To the north, a large throne sits,
carved from wood and painted gold.

5983.name: {y[{Y[ {&T{*he {GM{gakou{7-{RT{rorregiano {GR{goad {Y]{y]{x
description: The cobble stone road leads south from the hamlet of Twin Corners
across the Torregiano Plains, crossing a shallow canyon and into the
side of a volcano.  The road itself is big enough for two airships and
foot traffic.  On either side of the road are the grassy flatlands of
the plains.

5773.name: Calm Part Of The River
description: You float along the calm part of the river.  Westwards does the river
flow, calm and smooth.  The dam to the east, onwards to what awaits you.
Life Is Good.

5853.name: An Opening In The Rock Wall

5755.name: Cell 6
description: A room with no air, no light no sanity. A small bed hangs on the
wall to the west. A small sink and toilet sits in here too. You
are dead. You don't deserve to live anymore.

5720.name: Infront of The West Door
description: You stand infront of the western door.  To the east is the Northern part
of the mainhall.  To the north is the door, leading into the back hallway.

5743.name: Ontop Of The Tower
description: This is the top of the tower.  The view here of the desert is great.
Yellow sand totally surrounds the castle, and in the far distance other
colors can be seen.  To the south, the blue of the Sea Of Diamonds can just
be seen, as a sliver, almost looking like the horizon.  To the north, you
can see the green of the forests, and in the far far distance, 4 towers.  To
the east the Sea Of Swords flows, which disappears into the horizon.  To the
west, the brown and white mountains of the elemental canyon.

5797.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry {&C{*oal {&M{*ine{x
description: {*Two rails run into darkness, the only light comes from Makou Gas Lanterns
hanging from the sides of the wall.  The walls, ceiling, and floor are
black, made from coal.  The walls seem to breath in and out....  The shaft
ends, and only a black wall stands here.{x

5981.name: {y[{Y[ {&T{*he {GM{gakou{7-{RT{rorregiano {GR{goad {Y]{y]{x
description: A stone bridge expands between the cliffed mountain wall to the
north, to the steep slope of the volcano to the south.  Below a river
rages and torments westernly around the sharp curves of the small
canyon below.  To the north and south a massive tunnel opens up into
the sides of the mountain, the green glow of makou gas lanterns coming
from within.  The tunnels along with the bridge are wide enough for
two large airships to pass each other, and for people to walk along
the sides.  A small sign above the southern tunnel reads "City Of
Makou".

5917.name: {W<{D<{CI{cntersection of {XN{Worth {cand {XA{Wxe {D>{W>
description: {WIf there is a bad side of town here in {DM{Wakou{W, this is it.  Beggars
everywhere, fights breaking out, and garbage strewn about.  How does a
town get like this, one can only wonder.  To the south lies a very
disturbing road that is little more than an alleyway, and more fights
are to the west.  {x

5909.name: {*[{7P{&ick {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThis road seems to be lacking in many qualities, including
maintenance repairs would be nice so as not to trip with every step
that is taken.  There are fights breaking out everywhere, and broken
bottles lay strewn about.  The road goes north and south, {x

5706.name: {*[{7W{&est {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WW{Dest {WA{Dvenue {Was it is.  An empty street with vacant lots.  Might
there be shops here in the future, or perhaps the warehouse district.
It continues to the north and to the south with more vacant lots.
{x

5830.name: {rAcademy {8Of The {WO{8u{Wt{8l{Wa{8w{Ws{x
description: Various scrolls and parchment litter dusty shelves and parts of the
floor here.  Around the room also lies objects useful for methods of
training one's skills.  An aged man works in the center of the room
with some younger people, helping them hone their skills.  Maybe he
could teach you a thing or two.

5872.name: {*[{7A{&lexandria {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WShadows are cast all about, due to the poor lighting.  People can
be seen all about in plain view, and some flitting about in the
shadows, both have quickened paces.  Beggars are absent from this
street though, which is odd.  The airship facility can be heard even
from here, and can be seen from the rooftops.  {x

5841.name: {8The {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {8Mortuary{x
description: {8The room lies very bare and dark.  A man sits at the back,
chisseling away at what looks to be a tombstone.  He barely notices
you, continuing grimly with his work.  Half finished tombstones lie
everywhere, with names and prints of all sorts.  The large amount of
tombstones helps hint at the number of casualties in the area, or
maybe just the insanity of the shop owner.  {x

5729.name: Guest Chamber
description: Four beds line the wall here. A warm fireplace lite and glowing, giving
off heat around the room. A pair of servant girls stands here waiting to
do you every command (don't even think about that). Pictures of the
days of Old line the wall and a music box in the corner plays a soft
melodie. A ticking of a clock makes your eyes fall as the soothing sounds
bring you into a deep deep sleep.

5744.name: To The Dungeon
description: You stand in the hallway leading to the dungeon.  The sound of water
dripping echos in this hallway.  Strange there would be water in the desert.
You here prisoners within.

5800.name: {&<{*< {CC{corner of {7T{&agan {cand {7Y{&uliath {*>{&>{x
description: {WThe street curves north from here.  To your south lies {CH{wo{Bm{Ce{wb{Clo{ww{Cn{W,
one of the many specialized shops in the area.  To your west lies a
strip club known as the {RSed{ruct{Rress {rHa{Rv{ren{W, known well by some, praised
by others.  All around are shaded alcoves of which an occasional
movement can be sensed, provoking a cautious atmosphere.  Further
north along the street can be heard faint laughs from a local pub no
doubt.
{x

5840.name: {yJ{8a{Wsp{8e{yr{W's {WWand{8s of Ail{Wment{x
description: {WThis room shimmers with dark magic, various wands display
throughout the store, all imbued with some {8dark power{W.  {yJ{8a{Wsp{8e{yr{W waves a
wand at a fly, demonstrating its capabilities as the fly falls limply
to the ground.  A buzz emanates from a particular group of wands, that
vibrate with dark magic.  They catch your gaze, almost hypnotically...
{x

5724.name: In The Hallway
description: This is the back hallway, you walk up a pair of stairs that leads to the
main tower.  You see a few paintings, and a pot in the corner.  To the
northeast you see a door, with stairs behind it.

5902.name: {WA Ransacked Pet Store{x
description: {yFrom the looks of it, this pet store is definitely out of pets.
All around there are broken open cages, and snapped leashes.  A small
man cowers in a corner, looking up he explains that the animals
escaped with the help of animal rights activists, he sincerely
apologises and continues back to cowering.  There are many tracks
along the floor, left obviously from the escaping pets-to-be.
{x

5730.name: Door to the outside
description: You stand to an exit leading out to the westerly tower.  Stairs lead back
up to the hallway, or south leads you outside to the desert.  Sand blows in
from under the door, showing that the harsh desert is just on the other side
of it.

5873.name: {*[{7A{&lexandria {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WA bustling street at this point, it is almost shoulder to shoulder.
People are running about like mad.  A bright {Ggreen {Wglow can be seen
from the northwest which is where airships come in.  {XD{WE{XA{WD{XW{WI{XL{WL{XO{WW {XS{WQ{XU{WA{XR{WE
is to the west, and there is a vacant lot to the north.  Those seem to
be in abundance here.  {x

5923.name: {y|{Y-{*[ {&E{*ntrance to {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {*]{Y-{y|{x
description: {3This is a tunnel that leads to Makou City.  The entire tunnel is
through solid rock.  It would appear that someone took a giant metal
tool and carved out the way.  The tunnel continues to the south, as
the northern way just collapsed upon itself.  {x

5897.name: {*[{7C{&oal {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8This street seems to be of the best quality in the city, though
well worn.  All along can be seen pubs and local shops selling their
wares.  People converse among themselves on the streets, shady figures
relieving them of their loads.  The occasional traveler passes by, and
everynow and then a cart, guarded well.  {x

5733.name: Inside The West Tower
description: The hallway is dressed in a blue and gold carpet, that leads up the
stairs and into the tower.  To each side, you see a little peice of floor,
where the servents walk on, because they are not as good as the queen.

5737.name: Hallway
description: This hallway leads out to the eastern tower, that is not attached to the
castle.  Back east is the library.

5819.name: {WThe {wMu{Wse{wum {Wof {rTo{8r{Rt{8u{rre{x
description: {WThis museum depicts many forms of torture and beings in pain.  The
walls are lined with many paintings and written accounts of such.
Throughout it also stands many statues and dioramas of such.  The room
is quite horribly lighted, but each exhibit is magically lighted,
creating a more genuine feel throughout the whole museum.  {x
A abstract picture of a man wrapped in barbed wire and being torn
apart is shown here, so vivid and lifelike it actually seems to scream
out.

5812.name: {*[{7K{&inieth {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Many shops of all sorts line this street door to door.  The
footholds are consistently better then that of Tagan's and the
lighting is the best of all the city.  Various people huddle in groups
on the street, watching a fight take place, or simply congregating on
the latest gossip of the city.  Few beggars reside on this street
compared to the rest of town, but in their place, nimble thieves lurk.
In a western direction is the tattoo parlor, and the mortuary lies to
the east.  {x

5816.name: {gJu{cav{gier's {yAnimal {rSticks{x
description: {yA putrid smell fills the room, emanating from walls lined with
various animals on sticks.  The ground is littered with various animal
part debris, the owner obviously to busy talking with himself to care
much for the appearance of his shop.  The thought comes to mind, who
would want an animal on a stick, but then again, your here arent you?
{x

5814.name: {*[{7T{&agan {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WThe street is difficult to walk on, the light being the only savior
from falling over a loose stone or such.  Loud music can be heard from
the south, the club "{YB{rad{Ya {rB{Yin{rg{W" filled with people.  Further east, an
almost visible stench emanates steadily from a shop.  Many people
traverse the streets, looking in shop windows, talking with friends,
or passing out from too much intoxication.  {x

5703.name: Path Going To The Cliff
description: The drop here is very far down. Don't Fall.

5767.name: Old Dock
description: You stand on an old rotting dock.  The boards scream at the pain of your
weight on you, black water flows below you, ice cold and deadly.  You will
need a boat from this point on....

5876.name: {*[{7E{&ast {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThe city lanterns blow low here, casting shadows about for lurkers
to lurk about within while they are lurking.  To the far north, the
airship facility looms, emanating various weird and freaky kind of
sounds.  A hint of {Dsmoke {Wlies to the southeast.  {x

5768.name: Raging River
description: You are rushed down this river, that seems to be like a wild horse.  It
flows into the darkness and pass jagged rocks and things that could be
painful if hit hard enough.

5835.name: {yThe Pipe and Bong shop "{CH{wo{Bm{Ce{wb{Clo{ww{Cn{x"
description: {yThe whole room is filled with a {Wsmokey{y haze.  Lining the walls are
shelves of glass bongs and pipes, ready for purchasing crafted by
master glassblowers.  Through the haze a counter can be seen towards
the back, a dark skinned drow is there, testing the merchandise.
{x

5710.name: Outside Figaro Castle
description: Before you stands a large castle, made from ancient stonework.  The large
iron doors are infront of you, two guards stand outside it, watching your
movement.  The castle is large, you see the basewall, and to either side, a
tower that is only attached by a walkway.  To the south is the desert....
Hot and harsh...

5739.name: Outside Figaro Castle
description: You stand outside the great castle.  The sands blow around you in furry.
You see a path east.  The sun is hot.  To the east the tower can be seen.

5810.name: {*[{7K{&inieth {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Many shops of all sorts line this street door to door.  The
footholds are consistently better then that of Tagan's and the
lighting is the best of all the city.  Various people huddle in groups
on the street, watching a fight take place, or simply congregating on
the latest gossip of the city.  Few beggars reside on this street
compared to the rest of town, but in their place, nimble thieves lurk.
{8To your east lies a store with leather backpacks on display.  {x

5708.name: {&<{*< {CI{cntersection of {7C{&oal {cand {7T{&agan {*>{&>{x
description: {WThe wrought iron gates lie behind, and a dishevled city lies ahead.
Once a mining city of note, Makou city has been overrun by outlaws,
only a few citizens of old remain.  Despite the obvious rate of crime,
many businesses still open daily here, the majority of which being
bars.  Far off the north lies the airship facility, and all around,
lie various shops and bars.

5809.name: {&<{*< {CC{corner of {7H{&essel {cand {7K{&inieth {*>{&>{x
description: {8The street is somewhat darker here, comparatively.  Light mainly
comes from store windows, leaving much in shadows.  A hideous smell
wafts from a shop to the north with a sign reading "{YT{ya{rg{yu{Yl{y'{Ys {yTa{rc{yos{8".
To your west the sound of clanking metal can be heard, warriors honing
their mastery on dummys at {WT{8h{We {yRu{8sh{yin' {rDra{8gi{rn'{x

5770.name: Raging River
description: A structure up ahead.  It looks to be cement.  The sound a water falling
over a wall can be heard, louder, louDER, LOUDER!

5986.name: {7D{&E{7A{&D{7W{&I{7L{&L{7O{&W {7S{&Q{7U{&A{7R{&E{x
description: {x
{x                  {GM{gakou {RZ{rero         {RT{rorregiano
{x                      {YU                   {RN
{x{7A{&lexandria Street {G<{mW{g--+-{7D{&E{7A{&D{7W{&I{7L{&L{7O{&W {7S{&Q{7U{&A{7R{&E{g-+--{ME{G> {7A{&lexandria {7S{&treet
{x                      {yD                   {rS
{x                      {GV                   {GV
{x                  {&P{*ort {GM{gakou         {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy{x
{*  The city of Makou ends with a giant tunnel leading north, big enough
for two large airships to pass safely inside.  The tunnel itself glows
green from the gas lights inside.  To the west another tunnel curves
around leading upwards, a sign points out the name Makou Zero.  To the
east another tunnel curves away leading downwards, a sign pointing out
the name Port Makou. Southwards is Makou City itself.{x

5836.name: {yTavern of the {rSlain {yBoar{x
description: The room is filled with laughs and conversations of patrons.
Throughout the room there are many known outlaws and citizens from the
other side of town.  This tavern is the main meeting place of many
outlaws of the area.  In different corners there are groups gambling,
or shady dealings happening before your eyes.  There are even women
gesturing to men and up the staircase.  A Sturdy barkeep stands behind
the counter serving one and all any drink he can provide.

5904.name: {WT{8he {rR{8usty {yH{8alberd{x
description: {8This pub is known as the rusty halberd.  Stools line the counter,
with a scarce amount of tables along the floor.  This pub seems
slightly darker then the others, but everyone still seems to be
enjoying themselves nonetheless.  Many steins lay empty in a corner,
piled up among many other broken ones, {x

5913.name: {*[{7P{&ick {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThis road seems to be lacking in many qualities, including
maintenance repairs would be nice so as not to trip with every step
that is taken.  Venturing a guess to say that no one cares about this
side of town would probably be accurate.  There are fights breaking
out everywhere, and broken bottles lay strewn about.  The road goes
north and south.  {x

5871.name: {W<{D<{CI{cntersection of {XW{West {cand {XA{Wlexandria {D>{W>{x
description: {WW{Dest {WA{Dvenue {W and {WA{Dlexandria {WS{Dtreet {W meet here, which heralds the
end of the vacant lots for the time being.  With all the vacant lots,
it makes one realize that with all of the emptiness, crime is down, in
this area at least.  {x

5879.name: {*[{7I{&ves {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WShadows within shadows upon shadows hiding in shadows.  That is the
perfect way to describe this road here, which perfectly resembles an
alleyway.  Something up north catches the eye, a patch of {Ggrass {W is
there.  Why is there {Ggrass {Wunderground?  {x

5758.name: Stairs to the Engine Room
description: The song of machinery echos loudly in this hallway.  It sounds even
louder down the steps that lead into the basement.  To the east is the door
going out.

5775.name: {Y@{*]-[{CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {RTunnel{*]-[{Y@{x
description: The rocks here have been carved clean and clear.  The walls appear to be
smooth and give way to a small path or road of some sort.  You see light up
ahead, and the sound of people.

5792.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry {&C{*oal {&M{*ine{x
description: {*Two rails run into darkness, the only light comes from Makou Gas Lanterns
hanging from the sides of the wall.  The walls, ceiling, and floor are
black, made from coal.  The walls seem to breath in and out....  The shaft
ends, and only a black wall stands here.{x

5747.name: Outside Cell 2
description: You stand in the dungeons of Figaro Castle.
Cell 2 is to the north.

5801.name: {*[{7Y{&uliath {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Along this shady cobblestone street line pubs and various shops
trying to pawn their wares.  Few people walk the street, and with
protection.  Shutters lay closed shut and the only light to counteract
the shady atmosphere of the street emanates the various pubs and
shops.  {x

5779.name: The Gates Of {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy{x
description: {x                  {&[ {CM A {cK {CO U  {R+  {GC {gI T {GY {&]{x
Before you stands a pair of rought iron gates, standing thirty
feet into the air, built into the rock of the walls in this cavern.
Two guards stand on either side of the gate, tense and ready for
anything that might happen.  The sounds of a city echo from behind
the closed gates, large crowds moving about, action, and adventure.
Makou City, home of "Makou Reactor Zero", the original Makou Reactor.
This once small underground mining town slowly thrived, until its
key location was picked for testing the new Makou Reactors.  A
contract signed with the city allowed the Tripower to work in the area
for ten years.  Afterwards the city would revert to its previous
government.  Tens years past, and Makou City became the first non-
Tripower government to own a Makou Reactor.

5821.name: Prince Albert's Stud Emporium
description: {8The walls are lined with various studs of all types, shapes, and
sizes.  A wall sized manual on one wall displays "how-to" directions
for piercing, instilling a somewhat disturbing state of mind.  A few
piercing needle's lie on the ground, some with small chunks of skin
attached to them.  The owner of the store, obviously not completely
sane, grins wildly, waiting patiently for customers to make their
choice.  {x

5750.name: Cell 2
description: A room with no air, no light no sanity. A small bed hangs on the
wall to the west. A small sink and toilet sits in here too. You
are dead. You don't deserve to live anymore.

5769.name: Raging River
description: Tossing and Turning in your boat, being swept pass large rocks and strage
beasts that have not seen light in years.  The river flows on into the
darkness, into the Future.

5716.name: Main Hall
description: You stand inside the main hall of the castle.  The hall is filled with
all kinds of diffrent banners and paintings, all symbolizing the king and
the castle.  To the west you see a door, a sign above it says "Armory".  To
the east you see another door, that reads "Weapon Shop".

5882.name: {*[{7I{&ves {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WYet another road in the great city of {WM{Dakou {Wthat appears to be
little more than an alleyway.  Shadows here are very deep, and they
have shadows themselves it seems.  To the south there is a patch or
{Ggrass {Wwhich catches the eye.  {x

5907.name: {*[{7M{&iner {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThe longer one stays on this road, the more it looks like an
alleyway.  Shadows are deep here and a faint glint of steel can be
seen from time to time.  The shadows, it seems, have shadows
themselves.  There is a small patch of {Ggrass {Where about the size of a
sword.  That is a bit odd.  Nonetheless, travelers shoud be wary and
cautious.  The road continues to the north and south.  {x

5900.name: {*[{7C{&oal {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8This street seems to be of the best quality in the city, though
well worn.  All along can be seen pubs and local shops selling their
wares.  People converse among themselves on the streets, shady figures
relieving them of their loads.  The occasional cart passes by, leading
to the reactor northwards, guarded well.  {x

5705.name: {*[{7W{&est {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WTraveling upon {WW{Dest {WA{Dvenue {Wholds no special thrills, as there is
nothing here for the time being.  Nothing but vacant lots for sale to
build upon.  If the price is right, maybe one might set up shop here.
{x

5712.name: Courtyard
description: You stand in a large courtyard. The ground here is made from the
stone of the castle. Here you can see parts of the castle sticking
out. There is a tower to each side and a large tower in the middle.
The sound of engines working in the background hmmms over the harsh
winds of the Sands of Sorrow.

5701.name: Path Going To The Cliff
description: You stand on a path that runs along the side of the mountain.
You see it goes east and then turns south out onto a huge cliff.

5894.name: {*[{7T{&agan {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WLighted rather well compared to the other streets, it is not hard
to notice the paving is done in the opposite quality.  Stepping along
it proves almost difficult, with many footholds being rather shifty.
Further along to the west can be heard tummult from many drunkards at
the {yTavern of the {rSlain {yBoar{W.  {x

5715.name: Northern Courtyard
description: You walk in between two diffrent buildings, down the middle of the
castle.  The walkway goes to the north and to the south.  To the north a
pair of large doors leads into the northern half of the castle.

5822.name: {WClot That {rWound!{x
description: {WThis room is relatively small compared to the others.  It consists
of a counter with a man behind it, he has scalpel in one hand, and
gauze in the other.  Like the near tattoo and piercing parlors, the
floor curiously has specks of blood on it.  The man seems not to
notice, obviously happy from the recent boost of business he has been
receiving from the local parlors.  {x

5877.name: {*[{7E{&ast {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThis is yet another one of the unremarkable roads in this city.
There are lots that lie to the east and west, but there is something
different.  It would appear that there is construction on them!  Maybe
someone is putting a house there, or something to that extent.  North
and south are the ways to go.  {x

5714.name: East Courtyard
description: You stand to the eastern part of the courtyard.  Here, large stone steps
lead up to a door, which goes into the western half of the castle.  The
courtyard stretches to the far east.

5837.name: Room of Congregation
description: {WA plain table rests in the center of this room, surrounded by many
chairs, some of which lie broken.  Along a wall hangs a horribly
tattered scroll, surrounded by a tremendous bloodstain.  Their lie
many carvings in the table, the ground around it looking halfheartedly
swept.  This is where the organized of this town used to meet, and
congregate.  Now, only the remnants lie scattered around.  The room
has obviously not been used in a very long time.
{x
A Tattered scroll reads: Rules Governing this meeting and citizens of this city...
Staring hard at the scroll for awhile you give up in frustration, only being able to decipher letters or a number here and there through the bloodstains and rips.

5742.name: Sleeping Chambers
description: The room is filled with gold cups, and coins.  A large feather bed sits
to one corner, large blankets stand on it.  Above the room a large fan
hangs.  The room looks fit for a king.  The carpet is the same red and gold
as the one on the doorstep.  You see another iron door leading to the east,
going up to the top of the tower.

5920.name: {*[{7A{&xe {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WIt may be wise for one to hold onto their purse tightly here, as
the shadows are the deepest here.  The light is so poor, it is a
wonder one doesn't trip over their own feet.  Sound of fighting can be
heard from the north, and the south leads to what may or may not be
safer.  {x
{x
{*The wrought iron fence is here to stop anyone from entering the
facility just down this massive cavern tunnel.  Makou Zero is the
birthplace of Makou Technology, the first reactor to go online, and
the first to be owned by another nation other than the Tripower.  Now
owned by the Makou City Government, a union of leaders whom run this
city, it remains generating to this day.  Unlike the Reactors of
Torregiano and other cities, the pressure boilers that compress the
lifestream into a gas are powered by coal, creating high heat and
heavy smoke.  The Gates appeared to be locked.{x
{*  (OOC) This area has been left unoverhauled compared to that of
Makou City itself.  A few minor changes and colored room names have
been added, but the rest, including the typo of our original spelling,
Mako, remain.  Welcome to the first Makou Reactor.{x

5915.name: {W<{D<{CI{cntersection of {XN{Worth {cand {XP{Wick {D>{W>
description: {WFights in the streets, beggars everywhere, garbage strean about,
and unconscious people sprawled out.  This is not the best side of
town to be on, unless there is a chip on the shoulder.  The road, and
fights, continue to the south and the east.  {x

5813.name: {&<{*< {CC{corner of {7T{&agan {cand {7K{&inieth {*>{&>{x
description: {8In all directions various shops can be seen, along with urchins,
thieves, and citizens along the road.  The lighting throughout the
city proves inconsistent, light here only being provided from shops.
The airship facility can be seen from here, rising over the north part
of town.  To your south lies a church and west, a museum.  {x

5765.name: Ladder at an unknown depth
description: How long have you been climbing.  Half Hour.....  An hour....  Day or
two.  You have lost track of all time, your muscles ache from climbing, you
are dead because the bottom will never come.

5766.name: At the bottom of a ladder
description: The Bottom of the shaft.  You do not know how long you've been coming
down here, but your finally here, above you is the horrid ladder that goes
for miles and miles.  You hear the sound of a running river, but it makes
you think, a river this far below the realms.

5992.name: {WA{Dbandoned {WS{Dhop{x
description: {DThis would appear to have been a shop at one time.  What happened
to it is unknown.  Perhaps the owner died, and left no heir in their
stead, and thus it was closed.  Or perhaps they were lost among the
less charitable streets in this city.  {x

5788.name: {YV{yalneid{Ys {GM{garketplac{Ge{x
description: {WThe marketplace has many various fresh grown foods.  Baskets of
fruit and bundled assortments of vegetables lie organised in lines
everywhere.  Valneid the owner watches you, waiting patiently for you
to make your purchase as he bundles up more vegetables.  A few others
roam the store, some noticably pocketing selected pieces from bundles
and baskets.  {x

5901.name: {*[{7Y{&uliath {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Along this shady cobblestone street line pubs and various shops
trying to pawn their wares.  Few people walk the street, and with
protection.  Shutters lay closed shut and the only light to counteract
the shady atmosphere of the street emanates the various pubs and
shops.  {x

5757.name: Cell 4
description: A room with no air, no light no sanity. A small bed hangs on the
wall to the west. A small sink and toilet sits in here too. You
are dead. You don't deserve to live anymore.

5725.name: Stairs to the Tower
description: This is the top of the tower.  The view here of the desert is great.
Yellow sand totally surrounds the castle, and in the far distance other
colors can be seen.  To the south, the blue of the Sea Of Diamonds can just
be seen, as a sliver, almost looking like the horizon.  To the north, you
can see the green of the forests, and in the far far distance, 4 towers.  To
the east the Sea Of Swords flows, which disappears into the horizon.  To the
west, the brown and white mountains of the elemental canyon.  A large
platform has been built on to one side.  A large crate, that looks like the
underbody of a ship stands.  A pair of staircase comes down from the
skeleton.

5783.name: {*[{7C{&oal {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8This street seems to be of the best quality in the city, though
well worn.  All along can be seen pubs and local shops selling their
wares.  People converse among themselves on the streets, shady figures
relieving them of their loads.  Off to the west can be seen a inn
teaming with people known as "{yThe {8O{Wu{8t{Wl{8a{Ww{8'{Ws {yReclude{8".  To the east the
{CMa{ck{Cou {8city pawn shop lies.  {x

5781.name: {y>>{&---{7>{&[{CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {*S{7q{*u{7a{*r{7e{&]{7<{&---{y<<{x
description: {8This is the center of {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy{8, recently renamed.  From all
around you can hear the commotion of everyday life in this now
dangerous city.  Shady figures walk the street, walking questioningly
close to many people conversing in the town center.  Many shops line
this main road, as well as an inn and pubs.  To your east lies a
market place, and west a sherriffs office.{x

5719.name: North Main Hall
description: The Main Hall continues.  This part of the hall is filled with nothing
but banners and flags.  In the middle of the floor a giant statue of a king
stands, holding his sword up high, towards to skylight in the castle.  To
either side is a door, leading into a back hallway.

5825.name: {yNog's {WNot{r-{Wso{r-{RP{rrime {RC{ruts{x
description: {WThe stench of dry {rblood{W reeks in this shop.  Obviously from the
animals {yNog{W cleaves apart to sell to customers.  Crudely cut meat of
many types rest around in piles, and stuck to the walls.  Even skinned
rodents lie around, giving you an idea of the skill of this butcher.  {x

5922.name: {y|{Y-{*[ {&E{*ntrance to {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {*]{Y-{y|{x
description: {3This is a tunnel that leads out of Makou City.  The entire tunnel
is through solid rock.  It would appear that someone took a giant
metal tool and carved out the way.  The tunnel continues to the north,
as the southern way just collapsed upon itself.  {x

5832.name: {WS{wu{Wp{we{Wr{wi{Wo{wr {WM{8i{Wn{8i{Wn{8g {WT{wo{Wo{wl{Ws{x
description: This shop is an obvious front for a not-quite-so-legitimate store.  While
the tools offered here could indeed be used for mining, they look to be
designed for a much more deadly purpose.  Most of the weapons adorning the
racks are forged with magic (as many of the OutLaws' weapons prove to be),
and sell for a pretty copper.  Of course, it takes only one time of using
these "tools" to see that they are truly worth their price.

5731.name: Outside Figaro Castle
description: You walk out onto hard sand, whipping around your feet like a snake.
You see the tower to the west. Guards stand out here watching for
invaders.

5811.name: {*[{7K{&inieth {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Many shops of all sorts line this street door to door.  The
footholds are consistently better then that of Tagan's and the
lighting is the best of all the city.  Various people huddle in groups
on the street, watching a fight take place, or simply congregating on
the latest gossip of the city.  Few beggars reside on this street
compared to the rest of town, but in their place, nimble thieves lurk.
Off to the west is the Piercing Parlor, and looming darkly from the
east, is wand shop.  {x

5881.name: East Courtyard
description: This is the eastern part of teh courtyard, near the entrance.  Farther to
the east is an entrance to the castle, while to the west is the main part
of the courtyard.

5741.name: Inside The East Tower
description: The floor in here is decorated with red and gold colors.  To each side a
bit of floor sticks out, for sevents to walk on, because they are not good
enough to walk on the fine carpet.

5709.name: {*[{7T{&agan {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WLighted rather well compared to many other streets of the area, it
is not difficult to notice the quality of the road is lacking to that
of the good lighting.  To your south lies a derelict building, old and
seemingly unused for quite some time.

5912.name: {*[{7M{&akou {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {WTurning ones back to the shadows is not a good idea.  Here they are
deep, since the lighting is very poor, and when that occurs, it is not
wise to ignore anything.  No matter what is being done, everyone is
always being watched it would seem.

5711.name: Inside Figaro Castle
description: The Great Welcoming Hall Of Figaro Castle.  Many guests have been greated
here, by Kings and Presidents.  The ceiling is very high, at the top, a fan,
slow spins, keeping the air moving.  Large iron doors lead to either side.
The door to the east has many locks and bolts on it, unlike to door to the
west, that has only one lock.

5786.name: {&The {*Old {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rity {GP{gool Hal{Gl{x
description: {WThis pool hall is in a state of massive disrepair.  All the tables
lie broken, and lamps shattered.  Along the floor lie the remnants of
all, many shards of glass, splinters of wood, and pieces of pool
balls.  From the looks of it, a massive brawl has taken place here,
more then once.  {x

5776.name: {Y@{*]-[{CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {RTunnel{*]-[{Y@{x
description: The Tunnel here looks like it was carved out of solid rock.  Torches hang
from either wall, leading the way.  The tunnel goes in about 50 feet, and
turns.  The light gets brighter.

5787.name: {WThe Sheriff's Office{x
description: {WDesks and chairs lay broken and turned over onto the floor.  A set
of keys lies on the ground, bent to the shape of no use.  Very little
light enters the room, the windows boarded up.  In the cell, the
sherrif sits, cowering.  Obviously put in his place by outlaws of the
town, he now rests in the custody he has placed upon them for so many
years beforehand.{x  {x

5736.name: Library of Figaro Castle
description: You stand in the great library of Figaro Castle. Scolars
stand here looking up magical spells and history. The walls
are made totally out of bookcases. Rows and rows of old and
new books. A large table sits in the middle of the rooms
with a light on top of it. A hallway is to the west.

5718.name: Weapon Shop
description: You stand in the Weapon Store.  The room is filled with crates, but no
one is around to help you.  A sign is here saying "We are sorry but we are
closed for awhile".

5823.name: {WT{8h{We {yRu{8sh{yin' {rDra{8gi{rn'{x
description: {WThe room reeks of sweat from many adventurers before honing their
skills upon the dummies provided here.  Many ripped apart dummies lie
in a corner, while the so-far-unbeaten dummy, {YY{yur{Yi{W, stares off into
space as ever, intimidating nonetheless.  Many bent weapons lay upon
the ground around the dummy, obviously proving useless against them.  {x

5898.name: {*[{7K{&inieth {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Many shops of all sorts line this street door to door.  The
footholds are consistently better then that of Tagan's and the
lighting is the best of all the city.  Various people huddle in groups
on the street, watching a fight take place, or simply congregating on
the latest gossip of the city.  Few beggars reside on this street
compared to the rest of town, but in their place, nimble thieves lurk.
{x

5704.name: Remains Of A Road
description: You stand at the begining of a large cliff.  To the south you see a
broken up road, leading towards the end of the cliff.  Tall figures stand to
the south, and the stench of death floats in the air.

5980.name: {G>{g> {GM{gakou{c-{CZ{cero {MT{munnel {g<{G<{x
description: A massive tunnel runs away from Makou City to the south, north out
the northern face of the volcano.  The tunnel itself is large enough
for two large airships to pass side by side with enough clearance, and
for even walking traffic to creep along the sides.  Large gas lanterns
hang on either side of the tunnel walls.  Above massive pipes run out
of the ceilings, smaller ones connecting off running to the lanterns.
Steam and other gases hiss from the pipes of Makou Zero above.

5799.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry {&C{*oal {&M{*ine{x
description: {*Two rails run into darkness, the only light comes from Makou Gas Lanterns
hanging from the sides of the wall.  The walls, ceiling, and floor are
black, made from coal.  The walls seem to breath in and out....  The shaft
ends, and only a black wall stands here.{x

5899.name: {*[{7K{&inieth {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Many shops of all sorts line this street door to door.  The
footholds are consistently better then that of Tagan's and the
lighting is the best of all the city.  Various people huddle in groups
on the street, watching a fight take place, or simply congregating on
the latest gossip of the city.  Few beggars reside on this street
compared to the rest of town, but in their place, nimble thiefs lurk.
{x

5908.name: {W<{D<{CI{cntersection of {WM{Diner {cand {WM{Dakou {D>{W>
description: {WThere is no crowd here, at would appear that the general population
is staying away from this end of the street.  Maybe it's time to turn
around and go another way, unless one would chance the road to the
south that appears to be little more than an alleyway.  To the east
there appears to be more of a crowd and slightly more light.  {x

5717.name: Armory
description: You stand in the Armory.  The room is filled with crates, but no one is
around to help you.  A sign is here saying "We are sorry but we are closed
for awhile".

5808.name: {*[{7H{&essel {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Though the light is dim along the street, light floods the street
from a shop to the north.  Crude slabs of meat hang openly in front
and a sign crudely reads "{yNog's {rMe{Re{rts{8" A little to the east, an
entrance to the airship facility lies, guarded well.  In a western
direction the faint smell of taco's can be detected.  Further east
lies the main street, Guile.  {x

5833.name: {yThe {8O{Wu{8t{Wl{8a{Ww{w {yAlchemist{x
description: Along the walls there are various potions, bottles of multicolored
liquids, and many puddles of spilled items.  At the counter stands
Lash, the Whip.  Popular with the outlaws for his own notoriety, and
for being the only alchemist around willing to serve fellow outlaws.

5728.name: Hallway by the Guest Chambers
description: You stand outside the guest chambers. To the north is a large
room for the traveling guest to rest. Stairs lead down to
an exit from the castle to the most westerly tower.

5896.name: {*[{7Y{&uliath {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Along this shady cobblestone street line pubs and various shops
trying to pawn their wares.  Few people walk the street, and with
protection.  Shutters lay closed shut and the only light to counteract
the shady atmosphere of the street emanates the various pubs and
shops.  {x

5802.name: {*[{7Y{&uliath {7S{&treet{*]{x
description: {8Along this shady cobblestone street line pubs and various shops
trying to pawn their wares.  Few people walk the street, and with
protection.  Shutters lay closed shut and the only light to counteract
the shady atmosphere of the street emanates the various pubs and
shops.  {x

5989.name: {-G{-r{-u{-f{-f{-n{-a{-r{-k{-'{-s {-C{-o{-r{-n{-e{-r {-G{-r{-o{-c{-e{-r{-y{x
description: Inside this small building appears several large isles filled with
foods and other supplies.  Amounst the shelves are canteens of water,
bottles of beer, potions, wands, small daggers and assorted tools.
Barrels line the wall filled with grains and other food stalk, along
with giant bins of vegitables and potatos.  In other bins filled with
ice, fresh fruit slowly ripens under the makou gas lanterns.  The
shopkeeper behind his small counter next to the only exit keeps a
watchful eye over all who enter his store.

5839.name: {yStashes {Wfor the Everyday {8O{Wu{8tl{Wa{8w{x
description: {WThis store reeks of leather and stale smoke, the windows let some
light in, but only enough for visibility.  Along the walls display
various packs designed to hold your extra load, whatever it may be.  A
clever looking man stands at the end, waiting patiently for you to
make your decision.  Behind the counter, the man has several bags,
filled already..  Assumingly for display.  {x

5763.name: Ladder at 200ft
description: Going farther down, down, down, down, down, down, into what though.  You
cannot see below you, it scares you what might be down there, something
evil, or something worth your while of this long climb.

5752.name: Outside Cell 4
description: You stand in the dungeons of Figaro Castle.
Cell 4 is to the north.

5771.name: Going Through The Dam
description: You flow through a large dam of some sort.  The water falls over the edge
and down into a dark pool below.  You see the dam is not a ruin, but is
still being used.  You almost see a figure of someone on the wall of it,
watching you go over....

5880.name: {*[{7I{&ves {7A{&venue{*]{x
description: {WThere are almost no shadows here, a city lantern burns bright and
clear.  On either side of the road, there are no buildings, but there
is {Ggrass{Wgrowing.  Both sides are large enough to hold a decent sized
building, and upon closer inspection, it is growing out of solid rock.
North and south lead into deeper shadows to other streets.  {x

5789.name: {yThe {8O{Wu{8t{Wl{8a{Ww{8'{Ws {yReclude{x
description: {W Many couches line the walls here, a healer standing in the middle
of the room.  Various people, come here and rest in this haven to rest
and recover.  There are some scruffy looking characters sitting in the
far corners of the bar, trying to stay out of sight, as other
adventurers recline on couches, slowly recovering.  {x

5777.name: {Y@{*]-[{CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {RTunnel{*]-[{Y@{x
description: You are walking down a large carved out tunnel.  The floor seems to be
liked it has been walked on many times, almost like a road, and you see the
tunnel goes north and south.

5785.name: {&I{*nn {&O{*f {&T{*he {&C{*oal {&M{*iners{x
description: {WA once prominent inn known as "Inn Of The Coal Miners" now lies in
delapidation, no doubt caused by outlaws.  The owner still stays here,
but looks badly shaken in the head from many run-ins with the new
locals.  Many tables lie overturned, and the stairs are in dire need
of repair.  Broken glass lies on the floor in some places, along with
soot around them, hinting at arson.  {x

5732.name: By the west Tower
description: You stand by the west tower. This tower is for the kinds sleeping
quarters. The door is closed to the north. Small scorpions run around
here getting away from you.

5901.room_name: A fellow citizen walks the street through the crowd

5904.room_name: A dwarven bartender stands behind the bar, serving drinks to patrons and eyeing you inquisitively.

5905.room_name: A {&m{*ale {&c{*hild{x runs around the streetings playing.

5910.room_name: A {&f{*emale {&c{*hild{x plays about along the street.
5910.keywords: makou city citizen girl child kid mkcit5910~

5915.name: A {&M{*ale {&S{*enior {CC{citizen{x~
5915.room_name: A {&M{*ale {&S{*enior {CC{citizen{x of {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy{x wanders about, almost with a lost look.

5916.name: The Male Teenager~
5916.room_name: A teenager wanders the street with his friends
5916.keywords: makou city citizen boy teen mkcit5916~

5917.name: The Male Teenager~
5917.room_name: A teenager wanders the street with his friends

5920.name: A {&F{*emale {&S{*enior {CC{citizen{x~
5920.room_name: A {&F{*emale {&S{*enior {CC{citizen{x of {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy{x slowly walks on the sidewalk.

5921.name: The Female Teenager~
5921.room_name: A woman walks with her friends window shopping.
5921.keywords: makou city citizen girl teen mkcit5921~

5922.name: The Female Teenager~
5922.room_name: A woman walks with her friends window shopping.
5922.keywords: makou city citizen girl teen mkcit5922~

5923.name: The Female Teenager~
5923.room_name: A woman walks with her friends window shopping.
5923.keywords: makou city citizen girl teen mkcit5923~

5924.name: The Female Teenager~
5924.room_name: A woman walks with her friends window shopping.
5924.keywords: makou city citizen girl teen mkcit5924~

5925.name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {CG{cuard{x~
5925.room_name: The {CMa{ck{Cou {GC{git{Gy {CG{cuard{x walks the streets on his beat.

5700.name: A Figaro Castle Guard~
description:
You see a Figaro Castle guard standing here, keeping post. His eyes
scan around watching for deadly people coming to the castle. He
looks somewhat tired, being out in the windswept desert.
5700.room_name: A Figaro Guard stands here watching over your every move.

5701.name: The Control Manager~
description:
He is dressed in the castle's offical clothing. He watches you
as you look around here. He guards a very large switch that is
behind him. He also keeps you from going down to whatever is
below the castle.
5701.room_name: The Castle's Control Manager stands here, guarding "The Switch".

5702.name: The Jailor~
description: DESCRIPTION
5702.room_name: The Jailor stands here, guarding the cellblock.

5703.name: The Room Maid~
description:
She is dressed in the female clothing of the castle. She stands here
making the beds for the adventurers who enter here.
5703.room_name: The Room Maid stands here, and asks you "Would you like to rest".

5704.name: The Matron Mother~
description:
She is old, and has seen many of the generations pass through here. Now only
a single child is under her care, how sad. Why don't you put the old bitch out
of her missoury.
5704.room_name: The Castle's Matron Mother stands here, watching over a single child.

5705.name: The Little Girl~
description: She tells you 'I'm going to marry the king when i grow up'.
5705.room_name: A little girl stands here, running around the room.

5706.name: A Castle Scholar~
description:
He is wise in his ways. He stands here researching magic and some
mysteries never told by them.
5706.room_name: A Castle Scholar stands here flipping some pages in a book.

5707.name: The Chancellor~
description:
He is the chancellor. He is what tells the king how to make up his mind, he keeps
watch over the castle.
5707.room_name: The Chancellor stands here, pointing bad stuff out.

5708.name: The {RC{raptain{x of the {CMa{ck{Cou {RG{ruar{Rd{x~
5708.room_name: The {RC{raptain{x of the {CMa{ck{Cou {RG{ruar{Rd{x stands here on patrol.

5710.name: An Old Mining Citizen of {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry{x~
subroutines: F for AHMV
5710.room_name: An Old Mining Citizen of {CMa{ck{Cou {RC{rit{Ry{x wanders around muttering about the olden days.

5711.name: Sh'Zocxik, Owner of the Broken Inn~
description:
A once revered member of this community, Sh'Zocxik now hides out in
his delapidated inn, cowering.  When the city became overrun with
outlaws, his inn was destroyed, but as of yet they have been unable to
